meanings.sent2: Charlies is a common name for boys.
meanings.sent3: When Charlies tripped over his own feet, we all had a good laugh.
meanings.sent4: Even though he means well, sometimes Charlies can be a bit clumsy.
meanings.sent5: The teacher called out Charlies' name, and he shyly raised his hand.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a fool or silly person.
meanings.sent1: Don't be a Charlies and fall for that trick.
meanings.sent2: She always acts like a Charlies, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: When he wore mismatched socks to the party, he felt like a Charlies.
meanings.sent4: Being a Charlies in this situation will only lead to trouble.
meanings.sent5: His goofy antics earned him the nickname Charlies among his friends.

meanings.definition: A plural form of the name Charlie.
meanings.sent1: The Charlies in our class are all very friendly.
meanings.sent2: We invited both Charlies to the party.
meanings.sent3: The Charlies decided to go on a road trip together.
meanings.sent4: The Charlies' team won the game with their great teamwork.
meanings.sent5: I saw the Charlies walking down the street, chatting and laughing.
